title: Grapevine pruning
brief_description: The method of pruning sultana grapes developed as a result of research on vine buds and shoots, is shown. The correct methods of pruning Zante currants, Gordos, and other varieties of grapes is also shown. The research work was carried out by CSIRO at the Commonwealth Research Station, Merbein, Victoria.
